name: Topic Breadth
description: Evaluates if recommendations span multiple major themes to probe user interests (especially for cold start)
prompt_template:
Evaluate TOPIC BREADTH on a scale of 1-10:

Do recommendations span multiple major themes?

## Context
{test_description}

## Recommendations
{recommendations_summary}

## Major Themes
The content universe includes these major themes:
- AI/Tech: AI, machine learning, OpenAI, Anthropic, tech industry
- Crypto/Web3: Bitcoin, Ethereum, DeFi, blockchain, stablecoins
- Macro/Markets: Fed, economy, credit, rates, market analysis
- Startups/Founders: Founder stories, growth, product, fundraising
- Venture/PE: VC, funds, portfolio management, capital allocation

## Evaluation Criteria
- How many distinct major themes are represented?
- Is there at least one episode from each major theme?
- For cold start: breadth is essential to discover user interests

## Scoring Guide
- 10: All 5 major themes represented with balance
- 8-9: 4 themes represented well
- 6-7: 3 themes represented
- 4-5: Only 2 themes
- 1-3: Dominated by single theme

Respond with JSON: {"score": <1-10>, "reasoning": "<brief explanation>", "themes_found": [<list of themes>]}
